::Battera::

She hears him and drops her jaw again.  She can't take it any more.  
She turned and looked at Grimmler. " The quarters that we will share 
will be more than fine for us. Thank you." Her face as red as it can 
get, she walks past the hatch and past Grimmler. She walked quickly 
to her room.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Grimmler::
> 
> Grimmler laughs.
> 
> "Allright, then," he says, still laughing, "You can use your 
quarters. With 
> one bed," he says the last a bit quieter, but loud enough for 
Battera to hear.
